title: Agoda.com offers discounts of up to 75% for Cambodia’s first ever flash saleTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Agoda.com offers discounts of up to 75% for Cambodia’s first ever flash sale
Agoda.com, one of Asia’s leading hotel booking sites and part of Nasdaq-listed Priceline Group, has gathered a list of hotels offering special prices for the first ever Cambodia flash sale, with discounts of up to 75% on accommodation in some of the country’s most popular destinations.
Moving at a slower pace than its neighbors Thailand and Vietnam, Cambodia has a wholly unique culture and laid back atmosphere that offers a less hectic travel experience. Friendly people, a variety of great vacation spots, and some of the world’s most famous landmarks come together to make it a superb destination for any type of traveler.
Agoda’s hotel teams looked at accommodation in four of the country’s top destinations and gathered a list of those offering special prices. Travelers looking to explore Cambodia’s labyrinthine, constantly evolving capital of Phnom Penh will have no trouble finding a great place to stay. Agoda customers rave about the Central Market and evening strolls along Sisowath Quay, plus a young but exciting food scene.
There are great deals in Kep and Sihanoukville as well, both of them popular beach resorts with great food and a wonderful, rustic charm from the pre-Khmer Rouge days, when the towns popped with glitzy mansions and swanky resorts.
And a visit to Cambodia wouldn’t be complete without seeing the stunning temple ruins in and around Siem Reap. The Angkor complex and its associated temples and ruins are globally famous and rightly so. Visit the huge main temple of Angkor, or the smaller but no less impressive structures of Bayon, Banteay Srei, or Ta Phrom, the “Tomb Raider” temple, among many others.
Tourist high season has not yet begun, so it’s a great time to visit Cambodia when the crowds are at their most manageable.
